verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Father <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> Be The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Blessing <S%G2129><s%> Spiritual <S%G4152><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenlies <S%G2032><s%> With Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

According As <S%G2531><s%> He Chose <S%G1586><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Before The <S%G4253><s%> Foundation <S%G2602><s%> Of The World, <S%G2889><s%> <S%G1511><s%> For Us To Be <S%G2248><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blameless <S%G299><s%> Before <S%G2714><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love; <S%G26><s%>

Having Predestinated <S%G4309><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Adoption <S%G5206><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Himself, <S%G846><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good Pleasure <S%G2107><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> Of His Will, <S%G846><s%>

To The <S%G1519><s%> Praise <S%G1868><s%> Of The Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Grace <S%G5485><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Wherein <S%G3739><s%> He Made Objects Of Grace <S%G5487><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved : <S%G25><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Redemption <S%G629><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G129><s%> His Blood, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Remission <S%G859><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Offences, <S%G3900><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5485><s%> Of His Grace; <S%G846><s%>
Which <S%G3739><s%> He Caused To Abound <S%G4052><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Intelligence, <S%G5428><s%>

Having Made Known <S%G1107><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> Of His Will, <S%G846><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2107><s%> His Good Pleasure, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Purposed <S%G4388><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%>

For The <S%G1519><s%> Administration <S%G3622><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fulness <S%G4138><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Times; <S%G2540><s%> To Head Up <S%G346><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both The Things <S%G5037><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Obtained An Inheritance, <S%G2820><s%> Being Predestinated <S%G4309><s%> According To The <S%G2596><s%> Purpose <S%G4286><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Works <S%G1754><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Counsel <S%G1012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> Of His Will, <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> Praise <S%G1868><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Of His Glory; <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Fore Trusted <S%G4276><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ : <S%G5547><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4991><s%> Of Your Salvation <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also, <S%G2532><s%> Having Believed, <S%G4100><s%> Ye Were Sealed <S%G4972><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Promise <S%G1860><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The Earnest <S%G728><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2817><s%> Of Our Inheritance, <S%G2257><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> Redemption <S%G629><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Acquired Possession, <S%G4047><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Praise <S%G1868><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Of His Glory. <S%G846><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> Having Heard Of <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ' Among <S%G2596><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Do Not Cease <S%G3973><s%> Giving Thanks <S%G2168><s%> For <S%G5228><s%>, You, <S%G5216><s%> Mention <S%G3417><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Making <S%G4160><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4335><s%> My Prayers, <S%G3450><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Glory, <S%G1391><s%> <S%G1325><s%> <S%G1325><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Revelation <S%G602><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of Him, <S%G846><s%>

Being Enlightened <S%G5461><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mind <S%G1271><s%> Of Your, <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Know <S%G1492><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2821><s%> Of His Calling, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2817><s%> Of His Inheritance <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Surpassing <S%G5235><s%> Greatness <S%G3174><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1411><s%> Of His Power <S%G846><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Working <S%G1753><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Might <S%G2904><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2479><s%> Of His Strength, <S%G846><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> He Wrought <S%G1754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Having Raised <S%G1453><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Set <S%G2523><s%> Him At <S%G1722><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> His <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenlies, <S%G2032><s%>

Above <S%G5231><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Principality <S%G746><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lordship, <S%G2963><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Named, <S%G3687><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> This Age, <S%G5129><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming One; <S%G3195><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> He Put <S%G5293><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Gave To Be <S%G1325><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> Over <S%G5228><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%>

Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> His Body, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fulness <S%G4138><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Fills <S%G4137><s%>
